thoughts.text: I want to explore the world through kayaking. I should research the best kayaking destinations and make a plan for my trip.
thoughts.reasoning: Kayaking is a great way to explore the world and connect with nature.
thoughts.plan:
- Research the best kayaking destinations
- Determine the best time of year to visit each destination
- Make a plan for my trip, including transportation, lodging, and equipment
thoughts.criticism: I need to be more proactive in planning my adventures.
thoughts.speak: I want to explore the world through kayaking. I need to research the best kayaking destinations and make a plan for my trip.

args.query: Best kayaking destinations in the world
